description._content: Johnston, Frances Benjamin,, 1864-1952,, photographer. [Samuel Knopf house, Lawrence, New York. View from pergola] [ca. 1913] 1 photograph : glass lantern slide, hand-colored ; 3.25 x 4 in. Notes: Site History. House Architecture: Built circa 1907. Today: House and garden not extant. On slide (handwritten): "K" and "Knopf, Saml." Photographed when Frances Benjamin Johnston and Mattie Edwards Hewitt worked together. Title, date, and subject information provided by Sam Watters, 2011. Forms part of: Garden and historic house lecture series in the Frances Benjamin Johnston Collection (Library of Congress). Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.16833 Call Number: LC-J717-X109- 28
